text:
On 4/13/2017 at 4:21 PM, sy1983 said: I requested an expedite on my wife's visa yesterday and got a reply today.
All it said is " Your request for expeditious processing of this immigrant visa petition is currently under review. You will be informed of the results when the review is complete"
Is this a good thing or a bad thing ? I see some people getting approval emails and not acknowledgment mails.
Anyone else get a similar reply ?
This is just an ack to let you know they received your request and will follow up with a decision. Requested expedited process on 2/26 and received approval on 3/6/17.
I got both an Ack email and Approval email. One approved, NVC does nothing else with the case. They immediately sent mine to the embassy. I made my own appt and processed med requirement. Best of luck.

thread.title_full: Requested expedite (split) - National Visa Center (Dept of State) - VisaJourney
